name: 4th International Conference on History, Art, Literature and Culture in South Caucasus and Black Sea Region
content: 2019 TBILISI 4th International Conference on History, Art, Literature and Culture in South Caucasus and Black Sea Region ORGANIZED by International Black Sea University (IBSU) DATES: September 27-28, 2019 VENUE: Tbilisi, Georgia (Republic of) International Black Sea University is organizing 4th International Conference on History, Art, Literature and Culture in South Caucasus and Black Sea Region, together with our partner universities, namely: Gori State Teaching University, Samtskhe-Javakheti State University, Batumi Shota Rustaveli State University and Iakob Gogebashvili Telavi State University. The Conference aims to bring together researchers, practitioners and policy makers to discuss issues, tackle real challenges, develop professionally, share opinions, find solutions and explore opportunities in the areas of history, art, literature and culture in Black Sea Region and South Caucasus. The conference is open to local as well as international participants. Applicants must hold at least a Master's Degree. Proposals for presentation can be submitted in English or Georgian.
